steps.title: Wrap a tape measure around your wrist (right or left).
steps.content: Wrap a tape measure around your wrist (right or left). Take the end of your tape measure and bring it all the way around your wrist. [1] X Trustworthy Source MedlinePlus Collection of medical information sourced from the US National Library of Medicine Go to source

steps.title: Note the circumference of your wrist.
steps.content: Note the circumference of your wrist. You can use the tables below determine your frame size, according to your wrist size. [2] X Trustworthy Source MedlinePlus Collection of medical information sourced from the US National Library of Medicine Go to source

steps.title: Bend your arm at a 90 degree angle.
steps.content: Bend your arm at a 90 degree angle. Be sure that your forearm is perpendicular to the ground. It doesn't really matter which arm you use, but you may find that the table below works best if you use your dominant side. [3] X Research source
